thread.section_title: Artfinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artfinder | artfinder.com | 3 of 43
thread.title: Leslie Bruce

author: Leslie Bruce
title: Leslie Bruce
text: My purchases from Artfinder have been absolutely beautiful, just as portrayed in the site, artists correspond well and quickly. If one thinks the prices are too high, just go to your local art gallery store, where you will see less quality, much less selection, and much higher prices. We did that. I have sent email to each artist telling them how beautiful their work is. I recommend highly if you want original art. I enjoy the smell of oil paint when I open my packages, love the texture and feel of texture and brush/knife strokes on canvas
